name: Point of Sail
description:
You have ideas. They come when you least expect them. The moment before you fall asleep. On a train in the middle of nowhere. During a meeting when you're supposed to be paying attention. They are your best ideas and you can't lose them.

All books are made with 40 pages of quality 70lb smooth textured paper.
Choose between blank or lined and get working

The Passport 3.5in x 5in        $12/book
The Designer 5in x 7in          $20/book
The Artist 7in x 9in               $30/book
Suite/one of each size.          $58/set

All books are made to order, and 100% by hand in Philadelphia, PA.

The Fine Print:
Please allow 2-7 business days for your order to be hand crafted. 
Emgie Libris CAN ship internationally. (Yes, to your country too.) 
Please note, however, that shipping costs have spiked in the last year due to fuel costs. 
Emgie Libris is not responsible for any packages confiscated at customs. (It does happen from time to time.) 

Thank you! -mg

name: Day Hike
description:
Follow-through is a rare thing. The time. The patience. The energy devoted to finishing what you've started. It takes effort, but that doesn't go unnoticed. You earn something and you get a little stronger. Your tool set gets a little bigger. Your confidence grows.

All books are made with 40 pages of quality 70lb smooth textured paper.
Choose between blank or lined and get working

The Passport 3.5in x 5in        $12/book
The Designer 5in x 7in          $20/book
The Artist 7in x 9in               $30/book
Suite/one of each size           $58/set

All books are made to order, and 100% by hand in Philadelphia, PA.

The Fine Print:
Please allow 2-7 business days for your order to be hand crafted. 
Emgie Libris CAN ship internationally. (Yes, to your country too.) 
Please note, however, that shipping costs have spiked in the last year due to fuel costs. 
Emgie Libris is not responsible for any packages confiscated at customs. (It does happen from time to time.) 

Thank you! -mg

name: Duck Duck Goose
description:
Lists help. We make them to keep our lives together. They make order out of chaos and productivity out of lethargy. We make them in order to destroy them. Cross things off. Move forward.

All books are made with 40 pages of quality 70lb smooth textured paper.
Choose between blank or lined and get working

The Passport 3.5in x 5in        $12/book
The Designer 5in x 7in          $20/book
The Artist 7in x 9in               $30/book

name: Emgie Libris x Jack Germain Mint
description:
Emgie Libris teamed up with leather hand bag designer Jack Germain to hand craft a new leather bound notebook. 
Our collaboration was born out of the idea that so much leather goes to waste during the production process. 
All leather EL x JG notebooks are made out of repurposed Italian leather from past and current Jack Germain collections. 

Thin enough to put in your back pocket, thick enough to hold all of your daily notes, and strong enough to never fall apart. Each book is handmade in the USA.

All books are made with 40 pages of quality 70lb smooth textured paper. 
Available in Ruled pages only.

The Passport 3.5in x 5in $45/book 
The Designer 5in x 7in $55/book 
The Artist 7in x 9in $65/book
